Hekiah's Trance.name: Hekiah's Trance
Hekiah's Trance.flavor: Your foe becomes lost in your eyes, shuffling in the direction of your gaze.
Hekiah's Trance.onHit: 1d8 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier. The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Shroud of Adeptus.name: Shroud of Adeptus
Shroud of Adeptus.flavor: Your enemy moves to strike you, but you stare into its eyes and rob the creature of its will.
Shroud of Adeptus.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you misses you with an attack
Shroud of Adeptus.effect: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Ultimatum of the Third Order.name: Ultimatum of the Third Order
Ultimatum of the Third Order.flavor: You speak in a secret tongue, assaulting the minds of your foes and presenting them with a mental dilemma.
Ultimatum of the Third Order.onHit: The target chooses either to be stunned until the end of your next turn, or to take ongoing 20 psychic damage (save ends).
Ultimatum of the Third Order.onMiss: The target chooses either to be dazed until the end of your next turn, or to take ongoing 10 psychic damage (save ends).
